Package org.apache.manifoldcf.agents.interfaces

Class TransformationConnectorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.manifoldcf.core.interfaces.ConnectorFactory<ITransformationConnector>
      • org.apache.manifoldcf.agents.interfaces.TransformationConnectorFactory
  • public class TransformationConnectorFactory
extends ConnectorFactory<ITransformationConnector>
    This is the factory class for ITransformationConnector objects.
